title: [COMPLETE] Server Maintenance - 3/03/2015 @ 0600 AEDT
body:
**UPDATE:** The maintenance is now complete and you can login to play. We did run into some issues that pushed us over our 2 hour window, sorry for that.


Hi all,

We're planning to do some maintenance to our servers and wanted to give you all a heads up.  

We'll be taking the Oceanic League of Legends platform offline for approximately **2 hours**, beginning at **0600 AEDT on the 3rd March 2015**.   At this time, games in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

Keep an eye on the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) and this thread for updated messaging during the maintenance.

Agent Mindstar

replies.body: The maintenance is now complete and you can login to play. We did run into some issues that pushed us over our 2 hour window, sorry for that.
4 hours later.. Have we any idea of when game will be back up an running?{{champion:126}}

> [{quoted}](name=Frotoxx,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v11hZ2vQ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-02T21:31:04.255+0000)
>
> 4 hours later.. Have we any idea of when game will be back up an running?{{champion:126}}

2 hours, it started 6AM australian time, so 8am NZ
Is it possible jus to change servers an play with the Americans? Lol

> [{quoted}](name=Frotoxx,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v11hZ2vQ,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2015-03-02T21:37:00.587+0000)
>
> Is it possible jus to change servers an play with the Americans? Lol

you then have to patch the client also for the server

> [{quoted}](name=II Joker AU,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v11hZ2vQ,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-02T21:40:53.975+0000)
>
> you then have to patch the client also for the server

I changed to North America but then my sign in didnt work.. Oh well, guess I'll be waiting..
you have to transfer your acc for 2600rp
Is there going to be a patch or something, and if so how big?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v11hZ2vQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-01T06:15:31.585+0000)
>
> Is there going to be a patch or something, and if so how big?

There won't be a patch.  It is just some internal maintenance.
Alright then thanks Mindstar.
Is this for the upgraded friends list feature that I have seen people using on other servers?

Guys , there is some kind of connection error showing up evertime , on EUWEST! Some of my mates made it to the game!


Anyone any idea how to fix it ?
we're up boys and gals
Yes they need to work on their organisation skills.
OCE is online now
Where are ranked ques?

Its not the fact that the servers are down that is the issue, its the fact that they have been down 45minutes longer than they were meant to be, 
and we have had no update whatsoever..
my lol client wont even open ...
plus ive had to re install 4 times now this is just pissing me off

It really is just you. during normal maintenance the client works as normal but  the LAUNCH button is grayed out and the server status switches to unavailable.
If yours won't open then you have an issue with your computer or your client. But you won't be able to re-install properly until the servers are back online.
Yeah don't worry, it's not just you, re-installing won't help, just wait it out.
Sooo... its now 10 42 Nz time, i thought it was supposed to be be up within 2 hours of starting??? any updates?

legit if you cant keep your words, dont you guys have to explain why and what is going to happen?
nice way to frustrate players,  expecting to play game anytime soon for 40minutes like dumb clowns, not knowing when the maintenance is going to finish
We're now 40 minutes past the predicted up-time. Any chance of an update?
any news on the server status?
Haha keep an eye ... updated messaging during maintenance :( where ???
This always happens... Can you give an exact time?
You're about half an hour over schedule guys... I'm itching to play some LoL :) Do you have a new estimated server restore time?
sooooo its 8:23AM AEST and the server is not up and running yet will it be up soon?
"rito" plz
is the maintenance ever gonna  finish?

Bard and the new skins came out already?
~~~~

> Bard and the new skins came out already?
> ~~~~

No. Bard's skin doesn't even have a splash art or Loading Image yet on the PBE. He'll probably be out in 5.5 though.
if its gonna take longer than 2 hours dont say 2 hours man cmon sort it out.
patience is a virtue, just play Dota :P
